San_Leandro.Ashland, California:
Ashland (formerly, San Leandro South) is a census-designated place (CDP) in Alameda County, California, United States. The population was 21,925 at the 2010 census.


== Geography ==
According to the United States Census Bureau, the CDP has a total area of 1.8 square miles (4.7 km2), all of it land.
